summary: Coordinated Universal Time  is the standard time zone of the world.
full_text:
UTC+01:00 is a time offset that adds 1 hour to Coordinated Universal Time .
This time is used in:
Central European Time
West Africa Time
Western European Summer Time
British Summer Time
Irish Standard Time

Romance Standard Time 
Swatch Internet Time
In ISO 8601 the associated time would be written as 2015-12-05T19:11:49+01:00.
title: UTC+1
